AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.welcome: Welcome to the luckiest casino north of America!
AboutPage.paragraph1: Canada777 is your best bet at getting an all-round game experience where luck is the name of the game.
AboutPage.paragraph2: As one of the best online casinos, we have made it our mission to create a gaming site that offers you the perfect platform to try your luck at.
AboutPage.paragraph3: Our bag of lucky charms is stacked with the best online games, in fact there is an incredible number of over 8000 games that have the potential of leading you on a lucky winning streak. What's more is that there are over 75 gaming providers who provide these games for your entertainment.
AboutPage.paragraph4: So get lucky and explore the enormous variety of games that cater to a wide range of gaming tastes. Roll the lucky dice and more on table games, spin your way to the pot of gold on slots, and turn the tables into cash in live dealer games.
AboutPage.paragraph5: Not only are we the best online casino for Canadian players, Canada777 allows players from around the world to try their luck here too and is available in 10 different languages.
AboutPage.paragraph6: To cater to a world of players, we have made multiple payments methods available so that you can turn your luck into a buck in no time.
AboutPage.paragraph7: We are lucky enough to have the best support team that is there for you 24/7 via Live Chat or email.
AboutPage.paragraph8: So go ahead and browse the site for more information. Visit the FAQ section to get you started and then get a lucky break and register in a few quick steps and become a player at not only the luckiest, but best online casino around!

FAQPage.title: FAQ
FAQPage.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQPage.a1: We are a online casino where gambling activities are hosted by numerous renowned gaming providers in the industry with over 3100 games to play. Click here to learn more about us
FAQPage.a2: We accept CAD, USD, GBP, and EUR. However, you can deposit in certain cryptocurrencies that will be converted to your choice of the aforementioned currencies to play in. See the Payment Page
FAQPage.a3: Canada777 is available to most players from around the world, unfortunately however, players from countries like Afghanistan, France, Russia, North Korea, and United Kingdom are restricted.
FAQPage.a4: Our amazing bonuses will have different terms and conditions, so read them carefully before accepting. If you have any further questions, please contact our brilliant Support Team.
FAQPage.q5: How do I claim a bonus?
FAQPage.a5: 1) Go to the Dashboard section in the from left side menu, 2) Select the Deposit Tab, 3) Choose Bonus Package, 4) Make your deposit and the bonus will be added automatically
FAQPage.a6: The wagering requirement specifies how many times the bonus funds have to be wagered before making a withdrawal. You will see requirements below each bonus on the Promotions page.
FAQPage.a7: Welcome bonuses provide new players with bonus monies equal to a percentage of their initial deposit to welcome them to the casino and give them a taste of whats on offer.
FAQPage.q8: What if I have a problem or complaint?
FAQPage.a8: That is why our excellent Support Team are there for you 24/7 to assist you with anything you may need via our live chat function or email at support@Canada777.com
FAQPage.q9: Is there a minimum or maximum limit?
FAQPage.a9: There is a minimum accepted deposit of US$ 15. The minimum withdrawal is US$ 50 with a maximum daily (24 hour period) withdrawal limit of $4,000.
FAQPage.a10: Absolutely, all games allow you to play for real cash prizes and luck jackpots along the way. If you feel the need to practice a bit first, you can play the games in Demo.
FAQPage.q11: How can I deposit or withdraw?
FAQPage.a11: The following methods are available: Interac, Visa, MasterCard, and Crypto Wallets: BTC, LTC, ETH, TRX, BNB, BUSB. Learn more on our Payments page.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: This page is for the more concerned player to provide you assurance that your privacy will be maintained as well as a full disclosure of the information that we gather and how it will and will not be used. We treat our players data as if it were our own, and we take great care to ensure that the greatest levels of personal privacy are maintained at all times.

section1.title: 1) Information Gathered
section1.content:
You will be asked to submit information such as your name, address, phone number, and email address when you register. This information will be saved on our secure servers alone by us and will never be shared with any third parties.

By registering to use our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the Canada777 Terms and Conditions.

section2.title: 2) Protection of Information
section2.content:
Canada777.com is scanned for vulnerabilities on a regular basis to guarantee that your information is kept as safe as possible.

All personal information is held on a secure network, and only a small number of people with the appropriate security clearance can access or alter it.

Any information provided is kept strictly confidential at all times.

Any payment information you enter is encrypted using the most up-to-date SSL technology to protect you from malicious or fraudulent internet behavior.

No payment information is retained on our servers; instead, it is sent via a secure gateway provider for maximum security.

section3.title: 3) Use of Information
section3.content:
We will only use your personal information to reply to inquiries or provide you with information about your account, such as available withdrawals or bonuses.

We may also send you emails on a regular basis to advise you of any seasonal promotions or offers to which you may be entitled and/or interested.

section4.title: 4) Cookies
section4.content: We use cookies (if you allow on your browser) to maximise your experience when navigating the site. This is to allow the site to pick up and recognise preferences based on your previous activity whilst playing with us, this allows us to ensure that when making any changes to the site we can establish what works well and what doesn't. This will help us to improve the overall experience that our players have when updating certain aspects of the site.

section5.title: 5) CAN SPAM Act
section5.content:
The CAN-SPAM Act defines standards for commercial email, establishes requirements for commercial messaging, allows recipients the ability to have emails sent to them stopped, and spells out harsh consequences for violations.

To be in accordance with CAN-SPAM, we agree to the following:

• Allow users to unsubscribe by using the link at the bottom of each email.
• Include the physical address of our business or site headquarters.
• Monitor third-party email marketing services for compliance, if one is used.
• Not use false or misleading subjects or email addresses.
• Identify the message as an advertisement in some reasonable way.
• Honour opt-out/unsubscribe requests quickly.

section6.title: 6) Security Policy
section6.content:
Canada777 assures that our players information is kept safe and secure at all times by using the most up-to-date software available. We have a team of highly qualified Casino Hosts on hand to set your mind at ease and deal with even the most difficult problems.

With an ever-expanding internet market, trusting an online casino can be a challenging decision. Our basic values at Canada777 are honesty and integrity, and all of our games are independently audited to guarantee that all of our players have a fair chance at the jackpots. We can be confident that your wins will be paid directly to your account as soon as possible thanks to our expert cashier team.

By implementing the newest 128-bit Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption technology, Canada777 can ensure that your transactions are always 100% secure. Sensitive information is safely transmitted over the internet to our secure server, which is protected by the latest firewall technology.

Our Casino Support is something we take pride in, and our hosts are here for support 24/7 to make your time with us as enjoyable as possible. Our hosts are trained in all facets of the casino and can handle any inquiry from beginning to end, ensuring that you are treated efficiently and professionally at all times.

ResponsibleGaming.title: Responsible Gaming
ResponsibleGaming.intro1: Canada777 is dedicated to responsible gaming, and we will always take the necessary steps to guarantee that we are completely supportive of all of our players in this regard.
ResponsibleGaming.intro2: We ensure that the games we provide bring enjoyment to all who choose to play, however we know that we also have a responsibility to all our players.
ResponsibleGaming.intro3: Whilst we understand that for many people online gaming is a hobby and provides a form of great entertainment, gambling can also lead to some players becoming addicted and thus using our services to fuel their addiction.
ResponsibleGaming.guidelinesTitle: To ensure that you are gambling responsibly, we suggest the following guidelines:

guidelines.item1: Do not gamble if you are recovering from a dependency or if you are under the influence of alcohol or any other substance.
guidelines.item2: Give yourself a set amount of playing time and limit yourself to this time, win or lose.
guidelines.item3: Do not rely on gambling as a source of income or to chase your losses.
guidelines.item4: Do not let gambling interfere with other aspects of your daily life.
guidelines.item5: Set yourself limits within your means, for both purchasing and losses before you begin.

ResponsibleGaming.assistanceIntro: If you feel at any point that your gambling is becoming irresponsible, our casino hosts have several options at their disposal to assist you. You may request the following:

a.title: a) Deposit Limits
a.description: We can assist by setting daily, weekly, or monthly limits to ensure you remain in control of your spending. These can be reviewed if desired.

b.title: b) Cooling Off Period
b.description: Take a break from your account if needed. You may request your account to be suspended for a specific period of time.

c.title: c) Self-Exclusion
c.description: If other alternatives have not helped and you feel out of control, self-exclusion may be the best option. Please speak with one of our hosts.

section1.title: 1) Purpose and Scope
section1.p1: This AML and KYC Policy outlines the measures and controls implemented by Canada777 to prevent and detect money laundering (ML), terrorist financing (TF), and other financial crimes.
section1.p2: It applies to all players, staff, agents, and third-party service providers engaged with our online casino operations.

list.item3: Proceeds of Crime and Terrorist Financing Acts in applicable jurisdictions

list.item1: Verify the identity of all customers before onboarding
list.item2: Monitor transactions to detect suspicious activity
list.item3: Maintain accurate customer and transaction records
list.item4: Train staff to recognize suspicious behavior
list.item5: Cooperate with regulatory and law enforcement authorities

list.item2: Utility bill or bank statement issued within the last three months
list.item3: Proof of ownership of the payment method used

sub2.title: 3.2 Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD)
sub2.note: EDD measures may include video verification, source of funds checks, and continuous account monitoring.

section4.title: 4) Risk Assessment
section4.content: Risk assessments consider geographic location, transaction volume and frequency, payment methods used, and behavioral patterns.

section5.title: 5) Ongoing Monitoring
section5.content: Transactions are monitored using automated systems and manual reviews. Accounts under investigation may be temporarily suspended.

section6.title: 6) Reporting Suspicious Activity
section6.content: Suspicious activities are reported to the Money Laundering Reporting Officer (MLRO), who submits Suspicious Activity Reports to the relevant Financial Intelligence Unit. Tipping-off is strictly prohibited.

section7.title: 7) Record Keeping
section7.content: All AML and KYC records are securely stored for a minimum of five years and are accessible only to authorized compliance personnel.

section8.title: 8) PEPs and Sanctions
section8.content: All customers are screened against Politically Exposed Persons (PEP) and sanctions lists. High-risk individuals require enhanced due diligence and senior management approval.

section9.title: 9) Training and Awareness
section9.content: All relevant staff receive AML and KYC training upon hiring and annually thereafter.

section10.title: 10) Internal Controls and Auditing
section10.content: The MLRO enforces this policy. Internal audits are conducted annually, and the policy is reviewed at least once per year.

section11.title: 11) Disciplinary Measures
section11.content: Failure to comply with this policy may result in disciplinary action, regulatory penalties, or criminal prosecution.

section12.title: 12) Policy Approval
section12.approvedBy: Approved by: Mark Martin, Compliance Officer / MLRO
